(Other than simply upgrading his weapons systems, not much. I was 
thinking of installing a few new fighting programs that he might find 
useful, but the upgrades are really that big a deal. I could give him 
new shoulder cannons and better optic lazars, but not much beyond 
that.)

Squizzy::
She checked on the Beholder clone. It was now 60% complete. She would 
make the few modifications to the bot once it was out of the CR tank.
She went tot he old body of Beholder and pulled out the mother boards 
and memory circuits. She would install them whent he clone was 
finished.

The Feline clone was only 35% complete. She would need more time to 
finish that cat clone. The mother board was slightly damaged and the 
memory circuits were only half there. Judging from the condition of 
the cat body, the explosion that had originated internally had blown 
out alot of the nessassary circuitry that was needed for a complete 
clone. Squizzy would have to come up with something to fill in the 
gaps. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Excuse me, Logo, but what are the new things the Alliance made?
> Beholder had some pretty up to date stuff, I want to know what 
Squizzy is
> giving him please...
